Title: Knight-Vexillor with Banner of Apotheosis
Legend: Knights-Vexillor clad in thunderstrike armour often bear a Banner of Apotheosis. Each of these holy standards is infused with the forge-magics of Grungni and can elevate the resilience of the Stormcasts to new heights.
Intro: A Knight-Vexillor with Banner of Apotheosis is armed with a Sigmarite Warblade.

Rules.Name: Soul-Charged Icon
Rules.Fluff: Banners of Apotheosis are potent icons to the Stormhosts, and those who fight in their shadow are filled with redoubled fervour.
Rules.Rule: Soul-charged Icon: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS units wholly within 12" of this unit.
